mapper.sql: SUBSCRIBER_ID, ASSESSMENT_EVENT_ID, ASSESSMENT_ID, ZONE_ID, AMOUNT, TO_STAFF_ID, STATE_DATE, STATE
mapper.insert:
insert into ASSESSMENT_SUBSCRIBER
SUBSCRIBER_ID,
ASSESSMENT_EVENT_ID,
ASSESSMENT_ID,

AMOUNT,

INSERT INTO ASSESSMENT_SUBSCRIBER (SUBSCRIBER_ID, ASSESSMENT_EVENT_ID, ASSESSMENT_ID, ZONE_ID, AMOUNT, TO_STAFF_ID, STATE_DATE, STATE ) select seq_assessment_subscriber_id.nextval,assessment_event_id, assessment_id,zone_id,double_reward,0 staff_id,sysdate,'OPN' from assessment where assessment_event_id = #{eventId}
mapper.update:
update ASSESSMENT_SUBSCRIBER
ASSESSMENT_EVENT_ID = #{assessmentEventId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ASSESSMENT_ID = #{assessmentId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ZONE_ID = #{zoneId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TO_STAFF_ID = #{toStaffId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATE_DATE = #{stateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where SUBSCRIBER_ID = #{subscriberId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update ASSESSMENT_SUBSCRIBER set ASSESSMENT_EVENT_ID = #{assessmentEventId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ASSESSMENT_ID = #{assessmentId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ZONE_ID = #{zoneId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TO_STAFF_ID = #{toStaffId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATE_DATE = #{stateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SUBSCRIBER_ID = #{subscriberId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
